member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_INFO
member.summary: Describes a video extension command parameter.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_INFO.Name
member.summary: A pointer to a wide string containing the name of the command.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_INFO.Type
member.summary: A member of the specifying the type of the parameter.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_INFO.Flags
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the usage of the parameter.
